:notoc:

======
Coiled
======

`Coiled <https://coiled.io/>`_ helps you easily create and manage `Dask <https://dask.org/>`_ deployments
to natively scale Python.

We are currently in beta and welcoming early users. If you would like to join the beta, please
`sign up here <https://coiled.typeform.com/to/mu6Inr4S>`_.
If you're already signed up for the beta program, see the :ref:`getting-started` guide to get started with Coiled!

Feedback
--------

Feedback on Coiled is always welcome and encouraged. If you have any
comments, questions, or other feedback, please
`open an issue <https://github.com/coiled/coiled-issues/issues/new>`_ in the
Coiled issue tracker on GitHub.

.. link-button:: https://github.com/coiled/coiled-issues/issues/new
    :type: url
    :text: Report an issue
    :classes: btn-outline-primary btn-block


Thank you for trying out Coiled!
